text: Property acquired by a partnership shall be property of the partnership and not of the partners individually.
historical:
Prior Codifications

2001 Ed., § 33-102.03.

1981 Ed., § 41-152.3.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 203 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-602.03

Current through December 11, 2012
